L Oreal Natures Therapy Mega Moisture Nurturing Creme 16 oz
description: L'Oreal's Mega Moisture Nurturing Creme quenches dry hair?s thirst with intense moisturizing properties.

title: Advanced Skin Technology Green Cream Level 9 1 oz.
description: Advanced Skin Technology Green Cream Level 9 speeds up the skin's natural renewal process, creating smoother and brighter skin. Retinol helps tighten and firm, diminishing fine lines, wrinkles, discoloration and uneven texture. Cucumber extract soothes the skin leaving it fresh and supple. Features a unique airless pump system that prevents contamination of the product. Ideal for use after the skin has responded well to milder retinol treatments.

title: Clairol Natural Instincts Loving Care Color, 075 Light Ash Brown (Pack of 3)
description: Revitalize your color with a gentle, hassle-free formula. Natural Instincts Loving Care gives you natural-looking, illuminating hair color that leaves even fine or thinning hair looking full. title: Bumble And Bumble Blondish Hair Powder For Golden, Honey, & Caramel Shades 4.4-Ounces
description: Powdering is a centuries-old technique that Bb. session stylist Laurent Philippon made modern.  These magic, multipurpose sprays create instant fullness, enhance color, blend roots, add grip (when pinning up) and dry cleanse (for over-zealous product use or extending a blow-dry). For darker blondes - golden, honey or caramel - and lighter brunette (may be used to deepen pale blonde).

title: Kirkland  Minoxidil 5% Extra Strength Hair Regrowth for Men, 6 Month Supply
description: Kirkland Signature Minoxodil topical solution USP 5% is for men who have a general thinning of hair on the top of the scalp (vertex only). Minoxidil has been show to regrow hair in men with low to moderate hair loss. Please see images for a diagram to determine if this product will treat the degree of your hair loss.

title: Minoxidil for Men 5% Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Treatment 12 Months Supply Unscented 1 Year
description: Kirkland Signature Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Treatment for Men is for Men who have a general thinning of hair on top of the scalp.

L'Oreal Total Repair 5 Damage Erasing Balm 8.5 FL OZ
description: L'Oreal Total Repair 5 Damage Erasing Balm 8.5 FL OZ. The erasing balm is specially formulated for damaged, over processed and chemically treated hair. This intense luxurious reconstructing balm repairs: split ends, weak, rough, dull and dehydrated hair.
